alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany, northwestern Greene and southern Schoharie Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roxbury, or 16 miles east of Delhi, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Gilboa, Prattsville, Livingstonville, North Blenheim, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Durham, Rensselaerville, Conesville, West Settlement, Shoefelt Corners, Baird Corners, Huntersland, Manorkill, Broome Center, Smith Corner, Five Corners, Four Corners and North Settlement. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for east central New York.
